mapper.insert: insert into library (lib_num, lib_writer, lib_subject, lib_content, lib_pw, mem_id, ip_addr) values (seq_num1.nextval, #{libWriter}, #{libSubject}, #{libContent}, #{libPw}, #{memId}, #{ipAddr})
mapper.select: select lib_num libNum, lib_writer libWriter, lib_subject libSubject, lib_content libContent, lib_pw libPw, mem_id memId, ip_addr ipAddr from library
select lib_num libNum, lib_writer libWriter, lib_subject libSubject, lib_content libContent, lib_pw libPw, mem_id memId, ip_addr ipAddr from library where lib_num = #{libNum}
